00028 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00029 // Function: NewSWDesignPage()
00030 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00031 NewSWDesignPage::NewSWDesignPage(LibraryInterface* libInterface,
00032                                  QWidget* parentDlg) : libInterface_(libInterface),
00033                                  vlnvEditor_(0), directoryEdit_(0)
00034 {
00035     // Create the title and description labels labels.
00036     QLabel* titleLabel = new QLabel(tr("New SW Design"), this);
00037 
00038     QFont font = titleLabel->font();
00039     font.setPointSize(12);
00040     font.setBold(true);
00041     titleLabel->setFont(font);
00042 
00043     QLabel* descLabel = new QLabel(tr("Creates a software mapping design"), this);
00044 
00045     // Create the VLNV editor.
00046     vlnvEditor_ = new VLNVEditor(VLNV::COMPONENT, libInterface, parentDlg, this, true);
00047     connect(vlnvEditor_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00048     connect(vlnvEditor_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), this, SLOT(updateDirectory()));
00049 
00050     // Create the directory line edit and label.
00051     QLabel *directoryLabel = new QLabel(tr("Directory:"), this);
00052 
00053     QSettings settings;
00054     QString defaultDir = settings.value("general/defaultDir", QCoreApplication::applicationDirPath()).toString();
00055     directoryEdit_ = new QLineEdit(defaultDir, this);
00056     connect(directoryEdit_, SIGNAL(textChanged(QString const&)), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00057 
00058     QPushButton* pathButton = new QPushButton("Browse...", this);
00059     connect(pathButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(selectDirectory()));
00060     QHBoxLayout *pathLayout = new QHBoxLayout;
00061     pathLayout->addWidget(directoryLabel);
00062     pathLayout->addWidget(directoryEdit_, 1);
00063     pathLayout->addWidget(pathButton);
00064 
00065     // Setup the layout.
00066     QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00067     layout->addWidget(titleLabel);
00068     layout->addWidget(descLabel);
00069     layout->addSpacing(12);
00070     layout->addWidget(vlnvEditor_);
00071     layout->addSpacing(12);
00072     layout->addLayout(pathLayout);
00073     layout->addStretch(1);
00074 }

00083 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 // Function: selectDirectory()
00085 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00086 void NewSWDesignPage::selectDirectory()
00087 {
00088     QString dir = QFileDialog::getExistingDirectory(this, tr("Select Directory"),
00089         directoryEdit_->text());
00090 
00091     if (!dir.isEmpty())
00092     {
00093         directoryEdit_->setText(dir);
00094     }
00095 }

00097 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00098 // Function: prevalidate()
00099 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00100 bool NewSWDesignPage::prevalidate() const
00101 {
00102     return (vlnvEditor_->isValid() && !directoryEdit_->text().isEmpty());
00103 }
00104 
00105 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00106 // Function: validate()
00107 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00108 bool NewSWDesignPage::validate()
00109 {
00110     Q_ASSERT(prevalidate());
00111 
00112     // Check if the VLNV already exists.
00113     VLNV vlnv = vlnvEditor_->getVLNV();
00114 
00115     VLNV designVLNV(VLNV::DESIGN, vlnv.getVendor(), vlnv.getLibrary(),
00116         vlnv.getName().remove(".comp") + ".design", vlnv.getVersion());
00117 
00118     // Check if any of the VLNVs already exists.
00119     if (libInterface_->contains(vlnv))
00120     {
00121         QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Critical, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00122             tr("The SW design cannot be created because the VLNV %1 already exists in the library.").arg(vlnv.toString()),
00123             QMessageBox::Ok, this);
00124         msgBox.exec();
00125         return false;
00126     }
00127 
00128     if (libInterface_->contains(designVLNV))
00129     {
00130         QMessageBox msgBox(QMessageBox::Critical, QCoreApplication::applicationName(),
00131             tr("The SW design cannot be created because the VLNV %1 already exists in the library.").arg(designVLNV.toString()),
00132             QMessageBox::Ok, this);
00133         msgBox.exec();
00134         return false;
00135     }
00136 
00137     return true;
00138 }
00139 
00140 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00141 // Function: apply()
00142 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00143 void NewSWDesignPage::apply()
00144 {
00145     emit createSWDesign(vlnvEditor_->getVLNV(), directoryEdit_->text());
00146 }

00148 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00149 // Function: onPageChange()
00150 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00151 bool NewSWDesignPage::onPageChange()
00152 {
00153     // Discard the VLNV.
00154     vlnvEditor_->setVLNV(VLNV());
00155     return true;
00156 }

00158 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00159 // Function: updateDirectory()
00160 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00161 void NewSWDesignPage::updateDirectory()
00162 {
00163     QSettings settings;
00164     QString dir = settings.value("general/defaultDir", QCoreApplication::applicationDirPath()).toString();
00165 
00166     VLNV vlnv = vlnvEditor_->getVLNV();
00167 
00168     if (!vlnv.getVendor().isEmpty())
00169     {
00170         dir += "/" + vlnv.getVendor();
00171 
00172         if (!vlnv.getLibrary().isEmpty())
00173         {
00174             dir += "/" + vlnv.getLibrary();
00175 
00176             if (!vlnv.getName().isEmpty())
00177             {
00178                 dir += "/" + vlnv.getName();
00179 
00180                 if (!vlnv.getVersion().isEmpty())
00181                 {
00182                     dir += "/" + vlnv.getVersion();
00183                 }
00184             }
00185         }
00186     }
00187 
00188     directoryEdit_->setText(dir);
00189 }
